Book a guided tour around the city

Join our guided tour on our econonic bikes around the city.
We will take you through the most explicit and incredible adventure, with interesting and important facts of our city.
Find out who build the monuments here, what they did under the war, and much much more.

  • Length of the route: 45min
  • Distance 10 Miles
  • Price: 20 €
